  physical_appearance: \This is Lim Chong Pang\u0027s marriage certificate. The document contains the names of the witnesses
 the people who introduced the couple to each other
 as well the solemnizer. Above the title of the marriage certificate and between two phoenixes
 is the word “?\\ (joy)

  subject_terms_1: symbolizing the happiness of a matrimonial union. The borders framing the wordings comprise of two Chinese cherubs (one holding a bow and arrow whilst the other carries a horn) legal documents

metadata.title_text: Marriage Certificate of Lim Chong Pang
metadata.physical_appearance: "This is Lim Chong Pang's marriage certificate. The document contains the names of the witnesses, the people who introduced the couple to each other, as well the solemnizer. Above the title of the marriage certificate and between two phoenixes, is the word “?"" (joy)
metadata.subject_terms_1: symbolizing the happiness of a matrimonial union. The borders framing the wordings comprise of two Chinese cherubs (one holding a bow and arrow whilst the other carries a horn) legal documents
metadata.context_2: and peonies. The name of the printing company
metadata.context_4: is found at the bottom center of the document. "
